p: HCV prevalence in Pakistan ranged from 3.0% to 100%, with a median of 63.0%. The pooled mean prevalence in all populations with LRDs was 55.8% (95% CI, 49.1%‐62.4%). The pooled mean prevalence was lowest in patients suspected of having an LRD (20.7%; 95% CI, 13.5%‐28.9%) and highest in patients with HCC (72.4%; 95% CI, 64.2%‐79.9%).
